message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $20,000 represents the true value of this product, I understand your position. I could be persuaded to let it go for $18,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but $18,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $16,000. Can you meet me there?
Bob, we're getting close.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $17,000.  I believe this is a very fair price for a product of this quality.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16,500. Can you consider that?
